A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (Spoilers) This movie was really amazing\, and even brought a couple tears to my eyes when Luke died\, I can't believe some people hate it so much\, I can't wait till the 9th movie comes out. Don't listen to the judgmental comments out there because they are just being critical. Plus\, you shouldn't expect Luke to be the person he was when he was 20 or so because this is like 40 years later! So please just remember that you can't expect a movie to be the way that you want it to be.
